resources.string: Also Known as “Paris van Java" or “Paris of Java”, Bandung has everything that you would find in a city famous for its beauty and romance. From the breathtaking view of nature, to the glittering city life.
Home to two magnificent temples of Borobudur and Prambanan. But, there’s more to find in Yogyakarta than the temples. You will experience the true Javanese culture here in Yogyakarta
